name: Don't Die Today
description:
The army quarantined the city suddenly overrun by mutated zombies, regardless of any survivors that may still be in the city
When your city is full of zombies, the only thing you can do is wipe them out in an endless struggle for survival
In order to fight your way out, you need every item and weapon you can get your hands on

Features:
An action side scroller with retro pixel graphic
Move freely in a huge city like the way you do in sandbox games
2 Game Modes
3 main characters with 15 types of weapon to defend yourself
7 powerful mutated zombies to conquer

Gameplay:
◆ Each character has their own advantage and initial weapon
◆ Improve your abilities with DNA to survive longer
◆ You may equip one melee weapon and one ranged weapon at the same time
◆ Upgrade ranged weapons with parts at a workbench to greatly improve weapon stats
◆ Dismantling workers can dismantle junks for you, which is the main source of your parts
◆ You may be pleasantly surprised when searching abandoned houses
◆ Weapons and rare items are more likely to drop from powerful mutated zombies you defeat
◆ Unlock Dream Mode to experience the adrenaline rush of annihilating endless waves of zombies with unlimited ammo
